contextual-insert-colophon--from-templat.label: t__Insert new topic
contextual-insert-colophon--from-templat.description: t__Create a new topic and insert it under the frontmatter or backmatter as a colophon.

contextual-insert-colophon--to-existing-.label: t__Insert existing topic
contextual-insert-colophon--to-existing-.description: t__Insert an existing topic under the frontmatter or backmatter as a colophon.

contextual-insert-colophon--placeholder.label: t__Insert as placeholder
contextual-insert-colophon--placeholder.description: t__Insert a colophon under the frontmatter or backmatter as a placeholder.
